3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (20:22): davidb: Do we need to file a bug to get accessibility turned on on the Accessibility branch for Mac nightlies?

3fe145094f808469bffe4e30453f94c1 (20:24): davidb: I am not aware of any way, other than to kick off accessibility-enabled builds on try with a specialized MOZCONFIG, as hub is already doing.

22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:11): tbsaunde, : why you cancelled a review? and what does that mean?

22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:12): oh, and can I simultaneously use two queues for two different patches? I would like to start another one, but I prefer to keep changes separated from first one, and I think I'll be back to first one to apply review notes
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (21:13): askalski: i usually end up hg qpop -a before starting a new patch
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (21:14): and, shamefully, I sometimes edit .hg/patches/series
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (21:19): askalski: you can have more than one patch in a queue
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (21:20): askalski: canceling is something like "I don't want to r- this, but I'd like to see another version"
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (21:20): davidb: ^ seem about right to you?
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (21:20): it is a friendlier r-
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:20): hmm, and if I already started qnew ?
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (21:21): askalski: that's fine.
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (21:21): davidb: well, not exactly since someone could theoretically r+ it and the patch could land right?
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (21:21): tbsaunde: true
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (21:22): but your adding the comment to see the next patch is a good protection
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (21:22): askalski: qnew puts a nother patch in the series
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (21:22): try: hg qser
906cca2a5ed603c0f4e8b08b56a80768 (21:22): to see status of applied or unapplied patches
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:23): ok, you know, it seems like I'm not editing an old one but I am editing new one, so I will worry about it when I'll have to switch back to previous :)
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:27): I got akuda@nouri:~/Moz/mozilla-central$ hg qser
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:27): 0 A StateListPatch
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:27): 1 A bug-716644-expandoify-accessible-roles
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:27): akuda@nouri:~/Moz/mozilla-central$ cd
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:27): so 0 with the one I submitted and 1 with the new on
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:28): I checked, the old one *is* applied
22625f683d3bf3dd883140da90753a5c (21:28): so I guess it's just number
94d50e2efa8ecc99acd742d7cdd18f4a (21:47): askalski: I'm not sure what you mean "just number"
